content: 13 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 13 single_crochet 21 - b - 1 single_crochet 12 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 12 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 22 - r - 27 single_crochet 23 - b - 1 single_crochet 25 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 24 - b - 27 single_crochet this last row single_crochet in both loops knot every 2 yarn ends together and snip them all at the same length to prefend the coaster borders to curl you spray your coaster a bit with water put the coaster between a towel and a dishcloth and iron it when dry and cooled down the coaster is ready to use © t van seventer designs
